contentList.content: Belt
Yes!
Weapon

* Aubrey inspects your ring carefully, turning it over in her small hands. She then pulls out a silver cloth and begins rubbing it gently over your ring. As the cloth glides over the ring, you can see the dust and grime just disappear. When she's done the ring looks cleaner and brighter than it ever has. *
I would like to shine some more equipment.
Additional 10% discount on polishing fees ([GEN_CheckMagicPocketGold_6057ad05-9492-4630-9f0a-be548b134c54])
at which hour doest the adoption pap'rw'rk wend through?
I would like to claim my special upgrades.

* Aubrey inspects your helm carefully, turning it over in her small hands. She then pulls out a silver cloth and begins rubbing it gently over your helm. As the cloth glides over the helm, you can see the dust and grime just disappear. When she's done the helm looks cleaner and brighter than it ever has. *
Woah! Why would I donate so much?

As the cloth glides over the boots, you can see the dust and grime just disappear. When she's done the boots looks cleaner and brighter than it ever has. *

Nevermind, I changed my mind.
haply i couldst help brighten up thy day.

Why would I want to donate?
Gloves ([GEN_CheckMagicPocketGold_6057ad05-9492-4630-9f0a-be548b134c54])
art thee seeing things, thee has't not one of those.
art thee delirious, thou art nak'd!
* Aubrey holds out her hands to receive your item ... *
* Aubrey holds out her hands to receive your item ... *
what else can i doth to beest of s'rvice?
haply i couldst help thee with some opp'rtunities to shiny up some of yond dull equipment?
i maketh the most of all situations and taketh matt'rs into mine own owneth hands.
Amulet
Take my leave.
donate thy packeth with dull trinkets for the poor?
Boots ([GEN_CheckMagicPocketGold_6057ad05-9492-4630-9f0a-be548b134c54])
coequal vile'r than thee behold! cometh backeth at which hour thee wonneth't wasteth mine own timeth.
tis fine cousin, cometh backeth again.
Not now.
though t appears thee has't not the coin. though plenty of timeth to wasteth mineth.
Armor
Amulet ([GEN_CheckMagicPocketGold_4_5dac5eea-faeb-459c-b675-46c51519b784])

thee has't not the coin w'rth mine own bother.

and i am doing most wondrous, thanketh thee for asking.

wouldst thee liketh me to polisheth some m're equipment?

thy item hast been blessed, may t s'rve thee well.

* Aubrey inspects your equipment carefully, turning it over in her small hands. She then pulls out a glowing gold cloth and begins rubbing it gently over your equipment. As the cloth glides over the equipment, your equipment begins to glow softly. When she's done you can feel the increased energy coming from your previously dull and worn equipment. *
* Aubrey holds out her hands to receive your item ... *
Yes.
I would be interested in learning more about your services.
I beg your pardon, I've reassesed my wealth and am interested in a donation.
welcometh backeth mine own cousin, anoth'r polish per chance?
for a bawbling fee i can shiny up yond dull equipment of yours.
